column5: ~~~ I heard Dr Phil proclaimed, "The way to achieve inner peace is to finish all the things you have started and have never finished."    So, I looked around my house to see all the things I started and hadn't finished, and before leaving the house this morning, I finished off a bottle of Merlot, a bottle of Zinfandel, a bottle of Bailey's Irish Cream, a bottle of Kahlua, a package of Oreos, the remainder of my old Prozac prescription, the rest of the cheesecake, some Doritos, and a box of chocolates and the rest of my half-gallon of Blue Bell Original Vanilla Bean ice-cream.    You have no idea how freaking good I feel right now.
lol Dr. Phill would be proud!!
You Old Phart!!!!!! Between you and Chris, I`m gonna need a whole new wardrobe!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
oh, i DO know how you feel... just wish it was an option for me somedays now too
I was expecting a true philosophical answer to this question! LOL I should have know better.
